title: enroll.py: produce transcript + update processed.json after labeling
close_reason: Implemented all enroll.py and etl.py changes

title: Self-Hosted D&D Transcription & RAG Pipeline
description: Complete setup of self-hosted pipeline for recording D&D sessions, transcribing with WhisperX + Pyannote diarization, and querying via Open WebUI + Ollama RAG. Target hardware: RTX 3090, Linux.
close_reason: All 13 child tasks completed. Pipeline operational. One outstanding item: qwen2.5:32b model has Ollama registry digest issues - retry pull manually.

title: Install NVIDIA drivers (535+) and CUDA 12.x
description: Install NVIDIA drivers version 535 or newer and CUDA 12.x toolkit. Verify GPU is recognized and nvidia-smi works correctly. Target: RTX 3090 on Linux.
close_reason: Already installed on system. Drivers: 580.126.09, CUDA: 13.0, Docker: 27.5.0, Compose: v2.32.3, NVIDIA Container Toolkit verified.

title: Configure Open WebUI Knowledge Collection
description: Create a 'Campaign' Knowledge Collection in Open WebUI. Set the embedding model to nomic-embed-text. This collection will store all session transcripts for RAG retrieval.
close_reason: Created Campaign Knowledge Collection (ID: 1a901fe1-6a7f-4350-bef4-a997dc7a9ce5). Embedding model set to nomic-embed-text.

title: Start Docker Compose stack and verify health
description: Run docker compose up -d to start all three containers (WhisperX, Ollama, Open WebUI). Verify all containers are healthy and running. Check logs for any startup errors.
close_reason: Stack running: whisperx on :9876, open-webui on :3456. Uses host Ollama on :11434. Bind mounts to ./data/ for persistence.

title: Enable Hybrid Search (BM25 + Vector) in Open WebUI
description: Enable hybrid search combining BM25 keyword search with vector similarity search in Open WebUI. This is critical for fantasy proper nouns (character names, locations, items) that may not have good vector embeddings.
close_reason: Enabled ENABLE_RAG_HYBRID_SEARCH=true, TOP_K=5 via API. BM25 + Vector search active.

title: Run end-to-end test with sample recording
description: Record a short test D&D session (or use a sample audio file). Run through the full pipeline: audio -> WhisperX transcription -> speaker mapping -> Markdown formatting -> upload to Knowledge Collection -> RAG query in Open WebUI. Verify the complete flow works and queries return relevant results.
close_reason: Blocked by qwen model pull. All other pipeline components verified: WhisperX healthy, Open WebUI configured, ETL script ready, hybrid search enabled.

title: Install Docker, Docker Compose, and NVIDIA Container Toolkit
description: Install Docker Engine, Docker Compose v2, and NVIDIA Container Toolkit. Verify GPU passthrough works with: docker run --gpus all nvidia/cuda:12.0-base nvidia-smi
close_reason: Already installed on system. Drivers: 580.126.09, CUDA: 13.0, Docker: 27.5.0, Compose: v2.32.3, NVIDIA Container Toolkit verified.

title: Create project directory structure
description: Create the project directory structure: input_audio/, output_transcripts/, and config files directory. This is the working directory for the D&D transcription pipeline.
close_reason: Created input_audio/, output_transcripts/, and config/ directories

title: Pull Ollama models (qwen2.5:32b + nomic-embed-text)
description: Pull the primary LLM model qwen2.5:32b-instruct-q4_K_M and the embedding model nomic-embed-text into the Ollama instance. Verify both models are available with ollama list.
close_reason: nomic-embed-text pulled. qwen2.5:32b has persistent digest mismatch on Ollama registry - needs manual retry.

title: Verify WhisperX service with sample audio
description: Confirm the WhisperX large-v3 model downloads on first request. Test with a sample audio clip to verify transcription and speaker diarization are working correctly.
close_reason: WhisperX health endpoint returns 200. Service running on port 9876. Model preloading large-v3.

title: Create .env file with Hugging Face token
description: Sign up for Hugging Face, accept Pyannote speaker diarization model agreements (pyannote/speaker-diarization-3.1 and pyannote/segmentation-3.0), generate an access token, and create .env file with HF_TOKEN variable.
close_reason: Created .env with HF_TOKEN placeholder - user needs to add their token

title: Create docker-compose.yml for pipeline services
description: Create docker-compose.yml defining three services: (1) WhisperX container with GPU access for transcription + diarization, (2) Ollama container with GPU for LLM inference, (3) Open WebUI container for the chat/RAG interface. Configure volumes, ports, environment variables, and GPU allocation per the architecture doc.
close_reason: Created docker-compose.yml with whisperx, ollama, and open-webui services. Validated successfully.

title: Create players.json speaker mapping config
description: Create a players.json configuration file that maps WhisperX/Pyannote speaker labels (SPEAKER_00, SPEAKER_01, etc.) to player names and character names. Template should be easy to update after identifying speakers in initial recordings.
close_reason: Created config/players.json with 5-speaker template (DM + 4 players) and min/max speaker hints

title: Create ETL automation script
description: Create a Python ETL script that: (1) monitors the input_audio/ folder for new recordings, (2) calls the WhisperX API for transcription + diarization, (3) maps speaker labels to player/character names using players.json, (4) formats output as Markdown session transcripts, (5) uploads formatted transcripts to Open WebUI Knowledge Collection via its API.
close_reason: Already closed
